tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
This dashboard measures successful backend operations.

More details around what the metrics are measuring can be found on the far right of the page.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Update" Operations

"Phone number updates" and "Auth app updates" track both "change" and "switch" journeys.

- "Change" journey - “Change phone number” and “Change authenticator app" on the frontend. (So changing the default MFA method to a new one of the same type).
- "Switch" journey - "Use a different default method" on the frontend. (So switching the default method to the opposite method - so SMS → new Auth App OR Auth App → new SMS).

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Add Backup" Operations

These track the number of each type of MFA method (SMS or Auth App at present) being added as a new backup MFA method.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Delete" Operations

These track the number of deleted backup MFA methods.

queries.metricSelector: builtin:cloud.aws.lambda.errors:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function",entitySelector("type(~"AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION~"),  entityName.startsWith(~"integration-mfa-methods-~")"))))):splitBy("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function"):sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)

builtin:cloud.aws.lambda.errors:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function",entitySelector("type(~"AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION~"),  entityName.startsWith(~"integration-mfa-methods-~")"))))):splitBy("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function"):sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(30)

builtin:cloud.aws.lambda.concExecutions:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function",entitySelector("type(~"AWS_LAMBDA_FUNCTION~"),  entityName.startsWith(~"integration-mfa-methods-~")"))))):splitBy("dt.entity.aws_lambda_function"):sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(30)

cloud.aws.apigateway."5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameMethodRegionResourceStage"
:filter(
    and(
        eq("aws.account.id", "761723964695"),
        eq(stage, integration),
        contains("apiname","account-management-api-method-management"),
        eq("method","DELETE")
    )
)
:sum
:default(0, always)

cloud.aws.authentication.mfaMethodOperationCountByAccountIdEnvironmentJourneyTypeLogGroupMfaMethodTypeOperationPriorityIdentifierRegionResultServiceNameServiceType
:filter(and(
    eq("aws.account.id", "761723964695"),
    eq(environment, integration),
    eq(operation, "SwapBackupWithDefaultMfaMethod"),
    eq(result, "SUCCESS")
  ))
:count
:default(0, always)

:default(0, always)

:filter(and(
    eq("aws.account.id", "761723964695"),
    eq(stage, integration),

cloud.aws.lambda.durationByAccountIdFunctionNameRegion
:filter(and(
    eq("aws.account.id", "761723964695"),
    contains("functionname", "integration-mfa-methods-")
))
:splitBy("functionname")
:avg
:sort(value(max,descending))
:limit(100)
